title: Mauro Maver
text:
Ciao! üëã

My name is Mauro and I am a PostDoc Researcher at Unibz from Italy. üáÆüáπ
My research üß™ is all about allelopathic phenomena, especially in ancient and modern varieties of barley, from both a chemical and microbiological perspective. The molecules I‚Äôm interested in are the two allelochemicals, gramine and hordenine.üë®‚Äçüî¨
Furthermore, my background encompasses various aspects of üå± plant nutrition and physiology, with a special focus on nutritional deficiencies.
I‚Äôm a big fan of R and all the possibilities it offers, üßë‚Äçüíª from data analysis, data visualization, to data publication, and bioinformatics. üìâ
I also have a deep love for traditional Irish music and the Irish Gaelic language üáÆüá™, and I enjoy tinkering with electronic components and computers in my free time. üñ•Ô∏è
